issue.title: [CF 1344] More icon animations
issue.body:
Hi, lovely addon there. I've been using TMW since I joined WoW in Mist of Pandaria.

However, I do realise that WA is able to create a few types of icon animation which I can not replicate on TMW.

 

The animations are: Grow, Shrink, Spiral, Bounce, Slide to top/bottom/left/right.


I would like to suggest the above icon animations if it is easily implementable in TMW.

 

Keep up the good work.


> Posted by CurseForge user guardog88 | Imported from CurseForge issue #1344 | Raw

comments.body:
None of these are good fits for TMW. Sorry.

Edited Nov 26, 2016

> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
